languages.text: {n}Увы, стражи больше привыкли наказывать узников, а не соблюдать бдительность. Но наконец странная тень была замечена, когда один из внутренних шлюзов, запечатанных стражей, подал сигнал о вскрытии. Прибывший патруль заметил темную фигуру и открыл огонь, ранив врага и обратив в бегство.{/n}

{n}The wardens were better suited for punishing convicts than lookout duty. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увы, стражи больше привыкли наказывать узников, а не соблюдать бдительность. Но наконец странная тень была замечена, когда один из внутренних шлюзов, запечатанных стражей, подал сигнал о вскрытии. Прибывший патруль заметил темную фигуру и открыл огонь, ранив врага и обратив в бегство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The overseers were better suited for punishing convicts than staying on the lookout. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}

{n}The overseers were better suited for punishing convicts than staying on the lookout. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}

{n}The overseers were better suited for punishing convicts than lookout duty. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}

{n}The overseers were better suited for punishing convicts than lookout duty. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}

{n}The wardens were better suited for punishing convicts than lookout duty. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}

languages.text: {n}事实证明，看守更擅长惩罚罪犯，而不是放哨。不过到了最后，看守还是拉响了警报——之前被封锁的某扇内门不知道被什么人打开了。抵达现场的警卫看到了一个黑影，立刻开了枪。那只生物受了伤，落荒而逃。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The overseers were better suited for punishing convicts than lookout duty. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}事实证明，看守更擅长惩罚罪犯，而不是放哨。不过到了最后，看守还是拉响了警报——之前被封锁的某扇内门不知道被什么人打开了。抵达现场的警卫看到了一个黑影，立刻开了枪。那只生物受了伤，落荒而逃。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los vigilantes eran mejores para castigar a los presos que para vigilar. Al final, llegó una alerta: se estaba abriendo una de las puertas interiores que previamente había sido sellada. Los guardias que llegaron al lugar vieron una figura oscura y abrieron fuego. Herida, la criatura huyó.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The overseers were better suited for punishing convicts than lookout duty. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los vigilantes eran mejores para castigar a los presos que para vigilar. Al final, llegó una alerta: se estaba abriendo una de las puertas interiores que previamente había sido sellada. Los guardias que llegaron al lugar vieron una figura oscura y abrieron fuego. Herida, la criatura huyó.{/n}

languages.text: {n}監督者たちは、見張番よりも受刑者を罰するのに適していた。ついに警報が鳴った。それまで封印されていた内門のひとつが開かれたのだ。現場に到着した護衛は、黒い人影を見て発砲した。傷を負った生物は逃走した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The overseers were better suited for punishing convicts than lookout duty. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}監督者たちは、見張番よりも受刑者を罰するのに適していた。ついに警報が鳴った。それまで封印されていた内門のひとつが開かれたのだ。現場に到着した護衛は、黒い人影を見て発砲した。傷を負った生物は逃走した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les contremaîtres sont clairement mieux formés à punir les détenus qu'à jouer les sentinelles... Enfin, l'alerte est donnée : quelqu'un ou quelque chose tente d'ouvrir l'une des portes internes qui ont été scellées. Les gardes arrivant sur les lieux voient une silhouette sombre et ouvrent le feu... Blessée, la créature s'enfuit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The overseers were better suited for punishing convicts than lookout duty. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les contremaîtres sont clairement mieux formés à punir les détenus qu'à jouer les sentinelles... Enfin, l'alerte est donnée : quelqu'un ou quelque chose tente d'ouvrir l'une des portes internes qui ont été scellées. Les gardes arrivant sur les lieux voient une silhouette sombre et ouvrent le feu... Blessée, la créature s'enfuit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Aufseher waren besser dafür geeignet, Sträflinge zu bestrafen, als Wache zu schieben. Schließlich wurde Alarm ausgelöst: Eines der Innentore, das bisher versiegelt gewesen war, wurde geöffnet. Als die Wachen an dem Tor ankamen, sahen sie eine dunkle Gestalt und eröffneten das Feuer. Die Kreatur floh verwundet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The overseers were better suited for punishing convicts than lookout duty. At last, an alert came in: one of the inner gates that had previously been sealed was being opened. The guards who arrived on the scene saw a dark figure and opened fire. Wounded, the creature fled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Aufseher waren besser dafür geeignet, Sträflinge zu bestrafen, als Wache zu schieben. Schließlich wurde Alarm ausgelöst: Eines der Innentore, das bisher versiegelt gewesen war, wurde geöffnet. Als die Wachen an dem Tor ankamen, sahen sie eine dunkle Gestalt und eröffneten das Feuer. Die Kreatur floh verwundet.{/n}
